Number of Available R Packages from MRAN

Source: R/cran_packages.R
n_available_packages.Rd

MRAN has an archive of Snapshots of CRAN dating back to September 17 2014. This function returns the number of available packages according to the snapshot of https://cran.r-project.org on MRAN.

n_available_packages(date)

Arguments

date

the date of the snapshot to be used. It can be a Date object or a character in the format %Y-%m-%d.

Value

the number of available packages as an integer

Details

Data for a few selected dates before September 17 2014 can be obtained from the dataset Ecdat::CRANpackages.

See also

get_cran_history()
